chrome.tabs

Top-Level Variables
tabs: ChromeTabs
Classes
ChromeTabs

Use the chrome.tabs API to interact with the browser's tab system. You can use this API to create, modify, and rearrange tabs in the browser.

Top-Level Variables

static final ChromeTabs tabs

Accessor for the chrome.tabs namespace.

Class ChromeTabs

Getters and Setters

Stream<dynamic> get onActivated

Fires when the active tab in a window changes. Note that the tab's URL may not be set at the time this event fired, but you can listen to onUpdated events to be notified when a URL is set.

Stream<dynamic> get onActiveChanged

Deprecated. Please use onActivated.

Stream<dynamic> get onAttached

Fired when a tab is attached to a window, for example because it was moved between windows.

Stream<dynamic> get onCreated

Fired when a tab is created. Note that the tab's URL may not be set at the time this event fired, but you can listen to onUpdated events to be notified when a URL is set.

Stream<dynamic> get onDetached

Fired when a tab is detached from a window, for example because it is being moved between windows.

Stream<dynamic> get onHighlightChanged

Deprecated. Please use onHighlighted.

Stream<dynamic> get onHighlighted

Fired when the highlighted or selected tabs in a window changes.

Stream<dynamic> get onMoved

Fired when a tab is moved within a window. Only one move event is fired, representing the tab the user directly moved. Move events are not fired for the other tabs that must move in response. This event is not fired when a tab is moved between windows. For that, see onDetached.

Stream<dynamic> get onRemoved

Fired when a tab is closed.

Stream<dynamic> get onReplaced

Fired when a tab is replaced with another tab due to prerendering or instant.

Stream<dynamic> get onSelectionChanged

Deprecated. Please use onActivated.

Stream<dynamic> get onUpdated

Fired when a tab is updated.

Methods

Future<String> captureVisibleTab(int windowId, dynamic options)

Captures the visible area of the currently active tab in the specified window. You must have host permission(declare_permissions.html) for the URL displayed by the tab.

windowId The target window. Defaults to the [current window](windows.html#current-window).

options Set parameters of image capture, such as the format of the resulting image.

dynamic connect(int tabId, dynamic connectInfo)

Connects to the content script(s) in the specified tab. The runtime.onConnect event is fired in each content script running in the specified tab for the current extension. For more details, see [Content Script Messaging](messaging.html).

Future<dynamic> create(dynamic createProperties)

Creates a new tab.

Future<String> detectLanguage(int tabId)

Detects the primary language of the content in a tab.

tabId Defaults to the active tab of the [current window](windows.html#current-window).

Future<dynamic> duplicate(int tabId)

Duplicates a tab.

tabId The ID of the tab which is to be duplicated.

Future<dynamic> executeScript(int tabId, dynamic details)

Injects JavaScript code into a page. For details, see the [programmatic injection](content_scripts.html#pi) section of the content scripts doc.

tabId The ID of the tab in which to run the script; defaults to the active tab of the current window.

details Details of the script to run.

callback Called after all the JavaScript has been executed.

Future<dynamic> get(int tabId)

Retrieves details about the specified tab.

Future<dynamic> getAllInWindow(int windowId)

Deprecated. Please use query({'windowId': windowId}). Gets details about all tabs in the specified window.

windowId Defaults to the current window(windows.html#current-window).

Future<dynamic> getCurrent()

Gets the tab that this script call is being made from. May be undefined if called from a non-tab context (for example: a background page or popup view).

Future<dynamic> getSelected(int windowId)

Deprecated. Please use query({'active': true}). Gets the tab that is selected in the specified window.

windowId Defaults to the current window(windows.html#current-window).

Future<dynamic> highlight(dynamic highlightInfo)

Highlights the given tabs.

Future<dynamic> insertCSS(int tabId, dynamic details)

Injects CSS into a page. For details, see the [programmatic injection](content_scripts.html#pi) section of the content scripts doc.

tabId The ID of the tab in which to insert the CSS; defaults to the active tab of the current window.

details Details of the CSS text to insert.

callback Called when all the CSS has been inserted.

Future<dynamic> move(dynamic tabIds, dynamic moveProperties)

Moves one or more tabs to a new position within its window, or to a new window. Note that tabs can only be moved to and from normal (window.type === "normal") windows.

tabIds The tab or list of tabs to move.

Future<dynamic> query(dynamic queryInfo)

Gets all tabs that have the specified properties, or all tabs if no properties are specified.

Future<dynamic> reload(int tabId, dynamic reloadProperties)

Reload a tab.

tabId The ID of the tab to reload; defaults to the selected tab of the current window.

Future<dynamic> remove(dynamic tabIds)

Closes one or more tabs.

tabIds The tab or list of tabs to close.

Future<dynamic> sendMessage(int tabId, dynamic message)

Sends a single message to the content script(s) in the specified tab, with an optional callback to run when a response is sent back. The runtime.onMessage event is fired in each content script running in the specified tab for the current extension.

Future<dynamic> sendRequest(int tabId, dynamic request)

Deprecated: Please use sendMessage.

Future<dynamic> update(int tabId, dynamic updateProperties)

Modifies the properties of a tab. Properties that are not specified in updateProperties are not modified.

tabId Defaults to the selected tab of the [current window](windows.html#current-window).
